subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text:
Probably {{der|zh|sit}}; compare {{cog|my|လွင်|t=vivid}} ({{zh-ref|Schuessler, 2007}}).

{{och-l|皇|royal}} may be the same word ([[ibid.]]).

It may be related to {{och-l|光|light; bright}} ({{zh-ref|Wang, 1982}}; {{zh-ref|Schuessler, 2007}}). {{zh-ref|Wang (1982)}} additionally relates it to {{och-l|景|bright; sunlight}}, {{och-l|鏡|mirror}}, {{och-l|晃|bright}}, {{och-l|曠|bright}}.
